pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū upāsake padaso dhammaṃ vācenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.3: Upāsakā bhikkhūsu agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā viharanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.5: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū upāsake padaso dhammaṃ vācessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.6: Upāsakā bhikkhūsu agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā viharantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.7: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.8: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, upāsake padaso dhammaṃ vācetha;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.9: upāsakā bhikkhūsu agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā viharantī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.12: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, upāsake padaso dhammaṃ vācessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.13: Upāsakā bhikkhūsu agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā viharanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.14: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya pasannānaṃ vā bhiyyobhāvāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:1.16: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannaṃ padaso dhammaṃ vāceyya pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:2.1.6: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:2.1.17: Yañca padaṃ, yañca anupadaṃ, yañca anvakkharaṃ, yañca anubyañjanaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:2.1.20: buddhabhāsito, sāvakabhāsito, isibhāsito, devatābhāsito, atthūpasañhito, dhammūpasañhito.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:2.1.22: padena vāceti, pade pade āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:2.2.1: Anupasampanne anupasampannasaññī padaso dhammaṃ vāceti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:2.2.2: Anupasampanne vematiko padaso dhammaṃ vāceti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc4:2.2.3: Anupasampanne upasampannasaññī padaso dhammaṃ vāceti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
